name: Bank of Hawaii Corporation
description: Bank of Hawaii Corporation is a regional bank headquartered in Honolulu, Hawaii, that provides a wide range of financial services to consumers and businesses throughout the state and the Pacific Islands. Established in 1897, the Bank of Hawaii has a rich history and a commitment to serving the diverse needs of its customers. The bank offers personal banking, business banking, wealth management, and investment services, with a focus on enhancing the customer experience through innovative digital banking solutions. With a network of branches and ATMs across Hawaii and a robust online banking platform, Bank of Hawaii caters to the unique financial needs of its clients while maintaining strong community ties. The bank has also made significant strides in sustainable banking practices, investing in local businesses and initiatives that promote economic growth in the region. Its mission is to be the premier bank in Hawaii, recognized for service excellence, community commitment, and operational efficiency. The Bank of Hawaii is known for its personalized service and deep understanding of the local market, which sets it apart from larger national banks.
